hazards.description: Exposed wiring near the power outlet.
hazards.remediation: Immediately cover exposed wires with electrical tape and consult an electrician.

hazards.description: Loose cables creating a trip hazard on the floor.
hazards.remediation: Use cable organizers or covers to secure the cables along the wall.

funFacts.earthquakeTip: During an earthquake, seek shelter under the desk, away from windows.
